:v-model.description: The v-model binds a Boolean variable to control whether the modal is displayed or not
:v-model.description_zh: 通过v-model绑定一个布尔变量来控制模态框的显示与否

show.description: Whether to display the modal box, assign a value to the v-model
show.description_zh: 是否显示模态框，请赋值给v-model

width.description: The width of the modal, in rpx
width.description_zh: 模态框宽度，数值时单位为rpx

content.description: This parameter is invalid for modal content, such as slot content
content.description_zh: 模态框内容，如传入slot内容，则此参数无效

show-title.description: Whether or not to display the title

show-confirm-button.description: Whether or not to display a confirmation button

show-cancel-button.description: Whether or not to display a cancel button

confirm-text.description: Confirm the text of the button

cancel-text.description: The text of the cancel button

cancel-color.description: The color of the cancel button

confirm-color.description: Confirm the color of the button

border-radius.description: The value of the fillet of the modal box, in rpx

title-style.description: Customize the title style, object form
title-style.description_zh: 自定义标题样式，对象形式

content-style.description: Customize the content style, object form
content-style.description_zh: 自定义内容样式，对象形式

cancel-style.description: Customize the cancel button style, object form
cancel-style.description_zh: 自定义取消按钮样式，对象形式

confirm-style.description: Customize the confirmation button style, object form
confirm-style.description_zh: 自定义确认按钮样式，对象形式

async-close.description: Whether it is asynchronously closed or not is only valid for the OK button, as explained above
async-close.description_zh: 是否异步关闭，只对确定按钮有效，见上方说明

mask-close-able.description: Whether to allow clicking on the mask to turn off Modal
mask-close-able.description_zh: 是否允许点击遮罩关闭Modal

negative-top.description: Offset the value upwards to avoid possible keyboard overlaps, the unit is arbitrary, and the value defaults to rpx unit 1.4.4
negative-top.description_zh: 往上偏移的值，以避免可能弹出的键盘重合，单位任意，数值则默认为rpx单位 1.4.4

events.name: confirm
events.description: Triggered when the Confirm button is clicked

events.name: cancel
events.description: Triggered when the cancel button is clicked

methods.name: clearLoading
methods.description: When controlling asynchronously, you can call this method to clear the loading state without shutting down Modal
methods.description_zh: 异步控制时，通过调用此方法，可以不关闭Modal，而单是清除loading状态

slots.name: default
slots.description: Custom content is passed in, usually rich text, as described above
slots.description_zh: 传入自定义内容，一般为富文本，见上方说明

slots.name: confirm-button
slots.description: Enter a custom button for the scenario of authorization through the button in the pop-up window of the WeChat Mini Program
slots.description_zh: 传入自定义按钮，用于在微信小程序弹窗通过按钮授权的场景
